Results:  
  
**

Score 0-10

You are a great person! Keep doing what you do. Develop yourself, eat healthy,
love others and live the good life.

  
Score 11-12  
  
You are a wonderful professional. Working hard will make your dreams come
true. Please take your time and send us detailed information about who you are
and why you would like to be part of our team.  
  

Score 13+

It’s a match! Please send us all relevant information about your past
experience and future aspirations. We may then invite you for a meeting to see
whether we are suitable for a long-term relationship.

*We will contact only a limited number of people. Thank you very much for your time and interest in our company. Be healthy, loved and successful in your vocation.

title: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT DIRECTOR
description:
|  Prozaninie is a rapidly growing and highly innovative company providing
professional services in the field of online education, developed and
introduced Vedamo - an e-learning platform with real-time teaching
functionality and virtual class room.  
  
In regards to our growing business needs, we are now looking for a highly
motivated and ambitious Business Development Director to join its team. The
primary focus of the role is to develop new relationships within the global
market for teaching aids and actively drive expansion into all relevant
markets through both direct and online sales. The successful candidate will
have exceptional business acumen with proven experience in sales to the
education sector. He will also control the marketing spend including some
modest PR and participation to education sector exhibitions and similar
events.  
  
The role requires a highly professional, experienced and resourceful person
with the drive to take decisions and develop market presence from a low base.
The successful candidate will have a basic technical grounding in relevant
technologies and broad commercial knowledge of the relevant markets
complemented by exceptional communication and presentation skills. A dedicated
team player with a genuine interest in exploring different approaches to
winning the dominant position the product is able to deliver.  
  
Essential Duties & Responsibilities:  
• Responsible for taking ownership of the key client and opportunities list,
revenue, forecasting and the opportunity pipeline and will have a proven track
record of converting prospects to revenue.  
• Manage the Sales process for key opportunities in agreed selected global
markets, guiding the execution of the business deals pipeline from concept
phase through to deal closure and ensuring alignment with Company goals at
each stage. Assume lead role with Vedamo Directors to ensure fulfilment of
each phase of the customer engagement. Manage salesforce growth – both
directly and through suitable distribution – to achieve goals (and including
one current employee after a 6 month transition).  
• Develop relationships with customers, and ecosystem partners to identify and
develop business opportunities.  
• Work with Product Management, Marketing, and Service to define and rollout
road shows, customer events and campaigns including PR to achieve corporate
financial revenue targets on an annual basis and in line with the longer term
growth plan for the business.  
• Develop and maintain a deep understanding of the benefits, advantages,
merits, key application details and challenges associated with the service
offer compared to competitor technologies and work in collaboration with
Directors to consistently drive to a market leadership position.  
• Conduct strategic technology/market/business research in close collaboration
with key internal (headquarters) colleagues and external resources to support
the development of the annual business plan.  
  
Additional Responsibilities:  
• Deliver business and progress reports in line with agreed reporting
requirements.  
• Take a leadership role in corporate communications, training, events and
development activities.  
• Perform cross functional management duties such as task team leadership.  
• Advocate and promote Vedamo Products and Services at tradeshows, trainings,
and PR events, including attendance as a product expert at events, as needed.  
  
Competencies:  
• Deep understanding of the market in teaching aids and changes taking place
with adoption of online approaches  
• Excellent customer facing skills with a proven business acumen  
• Ability to work remotely, self-motivated and organised  
• Excellent communication skills both verbal & written. English must be
fluent, other languages an advantage.  
• Ability to clearly communicate complex issues.  
  
Qualifications, Education and/or Experiences:  
• Bachelor’s degree in related discipline is required and an advanced degree
is desirable.  
• Demonstrable expertise in Product Management would be a distinct advantage.  
• Knowledge and experience in selling software is required.  
  
Computer Skills:  
• Proficient in MS Office – Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook.  
• Skills to format text documents and presentations.  
• Web based application experience is preferred.  
  
Other Skills & Abilities:  
• Extensive travel (up to 50%) is required.  
• Ability to work remotely  
• Self-motivated and organized, able to work with minimal supervision  
• Proven ability to work effectively within a small team multi-disciplinary,
multinational environment.  
• Willing to take initiative and operate independently when required.  
• Professionalism and discretion essential.  
• High performance and quality of work standards.  
• Passion to contribute to the growth and success of the company.  
  
  
If you are interested in this job vacancy, please submit your application.
Please have in mind, that only the shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Technical Team Lead
description:
|  IBM Technical Support Services’ (TSS) mission is to become the largest and
most successful provider of technical support services in the world. The
Client Innovation Center in Sofia, Bulgaria is building a trans-disciplinary
team of network support specialists tasked with supporting our clients in any

The Network Support Specialist – Technical Team Lead will lead a customer

members.

delivery processes

appropriate actions are quickly implemented to address client concerns.

team members  
Provide training, and act as a catalyst to drive adherence, for all support
delivery processes

products  
Participate in initiatives and activities that improve overall team skills and
results  
This position will require ongoing skills development activities and
successful completion of all required training curriculum  
Other duties as assigned, including support center level responsibilities  
Support Center operational hours: 8AM – 8PM EEST Monday – Friday (incl
holidays)  
  
  
**Required:**  
  
**Knowledge / Skill and Expertise**  
  
At least 12 months of experience in a technical support center  
Advanced understanding of computer networking - TCP/IP, routing, switching,
firewalls  
Working experience with any enterprise class Cisco equipment  
Experience with Microsoft Operating systems at advanced user level  
Experience with Microsoft Office ( Word, Outlook) at advanced user level  
Bachelor's Degree (or equivalent) in Engineering or similar technical field  
Excellent command of spoken and written English (B2-C2 level)  
Active Cisco CCNA certification in any technology area  
  
  
**Soft Competencies**  
  
Excellent verbal and written communication skills  
Excellent organizational skills  
Good analytical and problem solving skills  
Ability to work within a team  
Self motivated  
Ability to produce good documentation  
Focused & Results orientated  
  
  
** Additional information**  
  
\+ Experience as a Team Lead or Supervisor is considered as advantage

equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive
consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender,

title: Campaign Data Manager
description:

related to business-to-business e-invoicing networking. In its’ office,
located in Sofia, the company is now seeking to recruit a talented Campaign

The Campaign Data Manager will play a key part in shaping strategic campaigns
and how they are rolled out.

to agree KPI’s and SLA’s for the team;

and Kuala Lumpur);

Experience

title: Sales Consultant – B2B
description:
|  HRS is a trusted partner for various businesses and people in Recruitment,
Temporary staffing, Payroll and all types of HR solutions. We are the experts
in recruiting qualified, professional and skilled people across a wide range
of specialized industries and professions.  
The extensive experience in the human resources industry under our belt has
given us valuable insights and an extensive knowledge of the corporate
cultures and thus enabled us to locate the best candidates for our clients.  
Our recruitment team is looking for a dynamic, ambitious and motivated
professional to join us as:  
  
Sales Consultant – B2B  
  
The role of the Sales Consultant in HRS is a unique combination between HR,
recruitment and sales processes. He/She will act as a Key Account Manager for
our clients, responsible for delivering high quality service and managing
challenging and interesting recruitment projects for companies such as Shell,
Volvo, Coca Cola, JTI, Ficosota and many more.  
  
Your main responsibilities will include:  
  
• Building long-term business relationships with key accounts based on quality
of service, open communication and mutual trust;  
• Leading client communication regarding their strategic recruitment needs;  
• Defining client requirements for specific recruitment projects, setting
deadlines and expectations;  
• Conducting end-to-end recruitment process for various positions open by the
key account clients;  
• Consulting clients and providing information about their competitive status
as employers, overall labor market trends and candidates’ expectations.  
  
The Sales Consultant role also involves “selling” the idea to work for a
certain company to potential candidates. Your responsibilities in this aspect
would be:  
  
• Creating job advertisements and posting them in various job portals;  
• Identifying and sourcing potential candidates using various recruiting
methods;  
• Cold-calling candidates from our data base to assess their availability and
interest to work for a certain company;  
• Negotiating with potential candidates and assisting them in the recruitment
process for our clients.  
  
The successful candidate for the role:  
  
• Has at least 2 years of experience as a sales representative in B2B oriented
service provider;  
• Has university degree in economics, business administration or similar;  
• Is fluent in English and proficient in MS Office tools;  
• Is a result-driven, proactive self-starter;  
• Is ambitious, positive-minded and energetic;  
• Is a strong team player;  
• Has experience in business communication, sales and proven track record in
leading successful negotiations.  
  
What we offer:  
  
• Excellent working conditions and a unique company culture that values team
spirit, open communication, mutual support and individual growth;  
• Attractive remuneration and bonus scheme;  
• Social benefits program including additional health insurance, sport cards,
team building events and more;  
• Company trainings and ability to constantly improve your skills and build on
your knowledge;  
• Opportunity to work in a young, friendly and fun team that will support you
and help you thrive;  
• Clear and consistent career path.  
  
If you think you are the right person for this job and our company is the
right place for you, do not hesitate to apply by sending your CV.  
  
Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.  
  
HRS Bulgaria has License № 1510/14.09.2012 for providing human resources
services, valid until 14.09.2017

title: Technical Account Manager fluent in English
description:
|  Founded in 2004, Sofica Group has become the largest independent BPO
provider in Bulgaria, part of the American company TeleTech. Our experience
allows us to provide leading local and global clients with a broad range of
tailored BPO, ITO and HRO services. Currently we are searching for:  
  
Technical Account Manager  
  
General Summary:  
  
The Technical Account Manager is the primary point of contact to TeleTech
technology for both our internal and external clients during the lifecycle of
a client program. They are responsible for the successful management of the
programs as well as end-to-end technology including but not limited to
desktops, network infrastructure, servers, applications and reports. They are
also responsible for all communications to the client about all technology
issues, changes and new innovation initiatives.  
  
Essential Duties & Responsibilities:  
  
• Primary technology point of contact for operations, sales and external
clients for their program;  
• Participates closely with the management teams of TeleTech's Operations and
other business owners to ensure quality customer support;  
• Will be responsible for Implementing TeleTech standards for maintaining a
stable environment in addition to making recommendations for updated
standards;  
• Will have responsibility of ensuring that all aspects of technology for the
program are within contractual specifications as well as that all aspects of
technology are in full working order for their clients program;  
• Keeps a centralized tracker of YTD outages, issues, change requests,
penalties and technology related revenue for the program;  
• Helps manage resolution of Teletech agent impacting outages. Keeps client
posted of progress throughout the fix process and provides after action report
to client within contractually agreed upon time period;  
• Communicates planned changes to clients with detailed area of impact and
risk mitigation strategy within agreed notification timeframe, or best effort
thereof;  
• Receives new client work requests. Provides time and cost estimates for work
requests within two working days of request. Ensures work requests are
complete within agreed on timeline.  
• Implements and enforces project change management processes, including
documenting financial implications of changes and coordinating cross-
functional IT teams to get changes completed successfully.  
• Provides weekly status to internal and external clients for programs
technology - outages, change requests, etc. Provides a weekly summary of
client program status for the Weekly CIO update.  
  
Job Specifications:  
  
• 5 years managing Information Technology teams or project teams;  
• Experience working in Account Management with heavy client interaction;  
• 3-5 years experience in a call center environment;  
• Thorough knowledge of network protocols and operation, desktop operating
systems and capabilities, and troubleshooting techniques;  
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English;  
• Prefer certifiable technical skills. Acceptable certifications include but
are not limited to Associate or Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Microsoft
Certified Product Specialist (MCPS), Microsoft Certified Engineer (MSCE);  
• Must have a completed end-to-end understanding of the programs specific
technology – infrastructure and applications (desktop to datacenter);  
• Has a full understanding of the contractual agreement with regards to
technology specifications, SLA’s, penalties, change management and billing for
the program.  
  
If you consider we can make a good team together please send your CV in
English stating the position you are applying for.  
  
All documents will be treated in the strictest confidentiality.  
  
Only short-listed candidates will be invited for an interview.

title: Software Engineering Manager
description:
|  Adcash is a real-time advertising trading platform that delivers maximum
exposure for advertisers and a simple, effective way for publishers to make
money. We’re committed to delivering the best customer experience, by offering
powerful, convenient tools and backing them up with dedicated, multi-lingual
support. We come from all over the world, with 20 nationalities and 15
languages between us, meaning we’re a diverse team, but all with one aim: our
customer’s success.  
  
We need an experienced Software Engineer Manager to join our busy IT team in
Sofia and become part of an exciting and growing enterprise.  
  
In this role you will be responsible for the development of our current
products and software tools as well as future releases, new products and
ongoing improvements. To fill this position you need to have ample experience
and proficiency in all aspects of the software development process.  
While this position may not require an extensive amount of coding, technical
knowledge and a broad understanding of ways to implement solutions in managing
huge amount of data and working with the best online technologies across
applications will be necessary.  
  
So, what will you be doing, day to day? You will...  
  
Manage and supervise the local IT project managers located in Sofia.  
This includes:  
Manage iterative technical execution through product teams, promoting
collaboration, open dialogue and a positive work environment.  
Negotiate with product owners and fellow managers to predict and offset
project risk.  
Define the technical product specs.  
Focus on the professional development of the teams.  
Interact with stakeholders and departments to ensure Software team goals and
priorities align with project vision and strategic direction.  
Define/refine processes, methodologies and tools related to our Software
Factory.  
Strive to standardize and to formalize in the following up and the execution
of projects. You will be the source of documentation, guidance and metrics on
the practice of project management and execution.  
Manage and publish the accuracy and the veracity of the metrics used and
shared with the top management around the roadmap of the company.  
Monitoring and reporting on active projects and portfolios (following up
project until completion), and reporting progress for strategic decisions.  
Provides a synthesis of all the projects (closed, on-going and planned) and
gathers data such as estimation, planning, scheduling, resource allocation.  
  
If you’re interested, we need you to have...  
  
Leadership and enthusiasm for developing a team-focused work environment.  
Desire to work with a tight-knit, multi-disciplinary team.  
Contribute to development of new solutions and expand of existing ones.  
Ability to mentor project managers and other technical staff (validation and
infrastructure engineers).  
A broad understanding of software engineering and Agile methodology.  
Several years experience architecting software products.  
Understanding of Design Patterns, of database architecture, of API and bst.  
Competency in managing big data and oversight of algorithm development.  
Experience leading teams of 10+ engineers.  
Experience with management tools such as Atlassian suite (Confluence, Jira,
...).  
Fluent in English.  
Self-starter.  
Ability to meet tight deadlines.  
  
By joining us, you will become part of our dynamic and ever-growing team. We
offer unlimited opportunities for self-improvement and growth, a competitive
salary, friendly multicultural environment and a modern office in the city
center of Sofia.  
If you have awesome organisational, analytical and problem solving skills,
then we'd love to hear from you!

title: Warehouse/ Logistics Manager
description:
|  We are supporting our client (international company with operations all
over the world) in the search of a Warehouse/ Logistics Manager. The company
is specialized in production and sales (B2B) of special products mainly for
the FMCG and chemical industries.  
It has a leading position in Bulgaria and within the region. The Plant is in
Sofia.  
  
Role:  
The Warehouse/ Logistics Manager will be responsible for the warehouse and
orders dispatch planning. A challenge of the position is to keep the Warehouse
in terms of the quality of production/ logistics and the internal
communication within the same divisions in the organization. He/ she should
organize properly and optimize the warehouse and the team to cover the orders
of the clients.  
The Warehouse/ Logistics Manager reports to the General Manager and will
collaborate with the Production, Supply and Sales departments.  
  
Primary tasks:  
• Ensure the correctness of the inventory level  
• Provide guidelines for the Warehouse Operators of the warehouse in the plant  
• Work closely with all involved departments (sales & export department,
production department, quality control, supply, logistics etc.) to meet the
orders scheduling  
• Collect and report all problems that could lead to delays in order
dispatching  
• Responsible for KPIs reporting of the warehouse management in the software  
• Provide valuable information about the warehouse  
• Manage the team and the projects within the Warehouse Department  
• Be part of the team for the further development and implementation of the
bar-coding system and the way the warehouse is operated  
• Ensure that there are no bottlenecks in the warehousing procedure  
• Co-operate every day with the production and logistics departments  
• Pursue optimization of logistics by the search of options for partial
outsourcing of the warehouse depot to external logistic facilities within the
country; pursue optimization of the transportation of the final goods and
participate in negotiations with customers for various products‘ delivery
schemes.  
  
Qualifications & requirements:  
• Experience in warehouse and/ or logistics management (min 3 years)  
• Experience with business operations and production practices  
• Good logical thinking and multitasking skills  
• Experience with ERP, Excel  
• Computer literacy  
• Good communicator  
  
The Company Offers:  
• International know-how and environment  
• Be part of a big industrial organisation  
• Participation in projects for further development of the plant  
• Dynamic and challenging environment  
• Vouchers  
• Laptop & mobile phone  
• Bonus  
• Additional company‘s benefits  
  
Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.  
  
License №1542, valid till 25.01.2018  
  
All applications will be treated with the strictest confidentiality.

title: Technical Support fluent in English and Italian
Network Security Engineer
description:
|  PPD is a leading global contract research organization providing
comprehensive, integrated drug development, laboratory and lifecycle
management services. Our clients and partners include pharmaceutical,
biotechnology, medical device, academic and government organizations. With
offices in 46 countries and more than 15,000 professionals worldwide, PPD
applies innovative technologies, therapeutic expertise and a firm commitment
to quality to help clients and partners bend the cost and time curve of drug
development to deliver life-changing therapies that improve health.  
  
We have now an existing opportunity for a proven professional to join the
company as:  
  
Network Security Engineer  
  
The person entitled to this role provides technical security expertise as part
of a global team. The core function of the position is to develop and maintain
information technology security systems and to serve in meeting internal and
external client requirements, including protecting the confidentiality,
integrity and availability of company data.  
We are currently looking for a person with specific focus on security incident
management.  
  
Main Responsibilities:  
  
• Providing support for network and network security architecture, including
routers, switches, firewalls, proxies, VPNs, and load-balancers.  
• Working with other infrastructure, platform, and application team members to
understand and enforce access and data protection policies with Access Control
Lists (ACLs), firewall policies, IDS/IPS policies, change management of
policies and configurations.  
• Providing specific security expertise to engineering teams, include network
design, security testing, authentication methods, implementing encryption,
logging, and secure data transfer.  
• Undertaking routine preventative measures and implementing, maintaining and
monitoring network security  
• Setting up and maintaining enterprise wide security systems.  
• Creating and designs security infrastructure per PPD specifications.  
  
Education and Qualification requirements:  
  
Bachelor's degree in the relevant field  
2+ years’ in network security technology or IT security systems Certification
of Security+, CCNA Security, CCNP, CCNP Security, SSCP, OSCP, CEH will be
considered an advantage.  
  
Main requirements:  
  
Proven knowledge of network, operating systems, programming, cloud,
telecommunication or IT security technologies and platforms.  
Experience with security technologies such as F5, Cisco, Palo Alto, McAfee,
A10, and Juniper.  
Detailed technical knowledge of cyber forensic investigating techniques/tools.  
Understanding of security issues associated with operating systems,
networking, and virtualization software.  
Client focused approach with strong interpersonal skills.
